name: dom-info
description: A jQuery-alternative for retrieving info about rendered DOM nodes.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && npm run minify && npm run gzip
scripts.minify: npm run cat && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output dist/dom-info.min.js dist/dom-info.js
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.validate-ci: npm run lint && npm run test-coverage-ci
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist
scripts.release-patch: npm version patch --message 'Patch release v%s' && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor --message 'Minor release v%s' && npm publish
scripts.release-major: npm version major --message 'Major release v%s' && npm publish

author: Ben Ilegbodu
